blocks.content:
# Welcome to the Dynatrace Operations Onboarding Launchpad

This launchpad is designed to accelerate onboarding for **Operations Teams** by centralizing essential resources for configuration, monitoring, and governance into a single, intuitive interface. It provides guided access to documentation, best practices, and tutorial videos that support:

- Efficient environment setup  
- Performance and availability monitoring  
- Incident response and troubleshooting  
- Automation and optimisation workflows  

You can view the following documentation to learn how to [Manage and Optimise Your Environment with Dynatrace](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/observe/infrastructure-monitoring)!
### Explore our Dynatrace University courses and YouTube playlists to help you getting started

content.title: The Dynatrace Implementor's Journey: 02 Deployment Operations
content.description: This course walks through deploying OneAgents and ActiveGates to establish secure telemetry relays across your environment.

content.title: The Dynatrace Implementor's Journey: 05 Custom Dashboard and Reporting Mission
content.description: A Beginner friendly course focusing on transforming raw telemetry into actionable insight.

content.title: Dynatrace Essentials: Exploring Problems
content.description: A Dynatrace University course that teaches you how Dynatrace helps detect and resolve issues in your environment.

content.title: AI Ops
content.description: Learn the concepts of AI Ops including auto-remediation, multidimensional baselining, configuring the Davis Assistant, and many others.

content.title: Dynatrace Automations
content.description: A Dynatrace University course which walks through the different automation functionality available in the Dynatrace platform.

content.title: Infrastructure and Operations App - Dynatrace App Spotlight
content.description: Infrastructure & Operations app walkthrough by Sr Product Manager answering key questions asked by Operations teams.

blocks.content: ### Explore sample use cases via our Dynatrace Blog posts

content.title: Advancing AIOps: Preventive operations powered by Daivs AI
content.description: Discover how Dynatrace Davis® AI shifts Ops Teams from reactive fixes to preventive operations using causal, predictive, and generative AI.

content.title: Create simple workflows to automate alerts during development
content.description: Automate alerting with Dynatrace Simple Workflows—set up single-step tasks to send incident notifications through your medium of choice.

content.title: Maximizing cloud efficiency: Driving cost optimization and sustainability with Dynatrace
content.description: Dynatrace helps cut cloud costs and carbon footprint with AI-powered observability—optimizing resources for efficiency and sustainability.

blocks.content:
### Documentation
---

Explore official Dynatrace documentation to access detailed guidance on infrastructure monitoring, cloud observability, automation, and best practices for ensuring operational excellence with Dynatrace.

#### Infrastructure Monitoring Overview
Discover how Dynatrace helps you monitor hosts, processes, and network health to maintain reliable and performant environments.
  * [Get started with Infrastructure Monitoring](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/observe/infrastructure-monitoring)
    * Follow this link to begin monitoring your infrastructure with Dynatrace.
  * [Host Monitoring](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/observe/infrastructure-monitoring/hosts)
    * Learn how Dynatrace provides deep visibility into CPU, memory, disk, and network metrics for your hosts.
  * [Process Monitoring](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/observe/infrastructure-monitoring/process-groups/monitoring/analyze-processes)
    * Understand how Dynatrace tracks critical processes and services to ensure smooth operations.
  * [Network Monitoring](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/observe/infrastructure-monitoring/networks)
    * Explore how Dynatrace monitors network traffic and connectivity to detect bottlenecks and anomalies.

#### Cloud and Container Monitoring
Gain insights into dynamic cloud environments and containerized workloads.
* [Kubernetes Monitoring](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/ingest-from/setup-on-k8s)
  * Learn how Dynatrace automatically discovers and monitors Kubernetes clusters, pods, and workloads.
* [Cloud Platform Monitoring](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/observe/infrastructure-monitoring/cloud-platform-monitoring)
  * Explore integrations for AWS, Azure, and GCP to monitor cloud services and resources.
* [Container Monitoring](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/observe/infrastructure-monitoring/container-platform-monitoring)
  * Understand how Dynatrace provides visibility into container health and performance.

#### Problem Detection and Resolution
Reduce manual effort and accelerate incident response with Dynatrace automation.
* [Problem Detection](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/discover-dynatrace/platform/davis-ai/root-cause-analysis/davis-problems-app)
  * Dynatrace uses AI-powered Davis® to detect anomalies and root causes automatically.
* [Workflow Automation](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/analyze-explore-automate/workflows)
  * Learn how to integrate Dynatrace with ITSM tools and CI/CD pipelines for automated remediation.
* [Alerting and Notifications](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/analyze-explore-automate/notifications-and-alerting)
  * Configure alerts and notifications to keep your operations team informed in real time.

#### Best Practices
Explore strategies to optimize monitoring and streamline operations.
* [Dashboards and Notebooks for Reporting](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/analyze-explore-automate/dashboards-and-notebooks)
  * Build custom dashboards and reports for operational insights.
* [Service-Level Objectives](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/deliver/service-level-objectives)
  * Define and monitor SLOs to ensure reliability and performance.
* [Capacity Planning](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/observe/infrastructure-monitoring/container-platform-monitoring/use-cases/resource-optimization)
  * Use Dynatrace data to forecast resource needs and prevent outages.

blocks.title: Essential Apps
blocks.description: All you need for daily operations.

blocks.content:
### Frequently Asked Questions
**What do I do if I need help managing my Dynatrace environment?**
* There are numerous support resources available to all Dynatrace users. Select the "Support" button in the bottom left of the navigation menu to access all our available support resources including:
  * Support Center
  * Documentation
  * Community
  * University
  * Support Tickets
* We also have a dedicated in-product chat team who can assist you
  * The in product chat is available 24/7 for existing Enterprise Success and Support customers. For standard customers the chat is only available during business hours.
